title: Coaches on the Hot Seat
itunes:title: Coaches on the Hot Seat
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – discuss the latest NFL news, including Nick Foles being granted his release from the Rams and Pete Carroll signing an extension with the Seahawks. Then, the heroes predict which coaches are on the hot seat going into the 2016 season. Plus, what’s up with Marc and Lil Debbie?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
